Package io.github.coho04.githubapi.entities

Class GHUser

java.lang.Object
io.github.coho04.githubapi.bases.GHBase
io.github.coho04.githubapi.bases.ClassBase
io.github.coho04.githubapi.bases.EntityBase
io.github.coho04.githubapi.entities.GHUser
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpRequestInterface, JSONHelper
Direct Known Subclasses:
SelfUser
public class GHUser extends EntityBase
Represents a GitHub user. This class provides methods and properties to access information about a user on GitHub.

  • Nested Class Summary
